banner-main.explore: Explore what we offer to you

header-main.presentation: Wait for them at the door of

extra-main.description: Here you will find a wide variety of the latest and greatest smart devices. We have something for everyone, whether you're looking for the latest iPhone or an affordable Android device.
extra-main.feature-description1: Stay ahead of technology with our selection
extra-main.feature-description2: Experience the convenience and satisfaction of shopping online
extra-main.feature-description3: Buy now and join millions of satisfied customers

whyus-main.text: We offer a wide selection of the latest and greatest mobile devices, with competitive prices, free shipping, and dedicated customer support to help you every step of the way.
whyus-main.item-description1: We work hard to make sure our prices are competitive so you can get the best value for your money.
whyus-main.item-description2: We offer free shipping on all orders, so you can receive your device quickly and without additional cost.

extracards-main.card-text1: Absolutely all transactions are private and 100% secure
extracards-main.card-text2: We send your order within 24 hours. Enjoy your new device!
extracards-main.card-text3: Dedicated customer support 24/7 to help you at all times

opportunity-main.text: Do you give us a chance?
